resources.string: Honorable Prof. M. N. Navale, a great visionary and dynamic leader, laid the foundation of a Sinhgad Technical Education Society . The Society is rightly imparting high standard of education at different institutes in the field of Engineering, Medical, Management, Pharmacy, Architecture, Computer Application, Education, Arts, Science, and Commerce and has acquired fame in a very short span.

Every year, millions of students pursue a Bachelor of Engineering or BTech to start a career in one of the most opted degree courses after 12th Science. Engineering is a discipline that requires the application of mathematical methods, scientific theories, and empirical evidence to create, analyze, and design technological solutions.
